section.title: Note from Epic University Hospital & Clinics
section.text: This document contains information that was shared with Alice Jones Newman. It may not contain the entire record from Epic University Hospital & Clinics.

td.paragraph: Ms Alice Newman is being referred to Community Health Hospitals Inpatient facility because of the high fever noticed and suspected Anemia.

text.footnote: documented as of this encounter (statuses as of 12/16/2020)

td.paragraph: darbepoetin alfa (Aranesp, Albumin Free,) 500 MCG/ML solution prefilled syringe

tr.td: Inject 1 Units as directed 1 (one) time per week.
Inject 1 Units as directed in the morning and at bedtime.
Take 1 Units by mouth if needed.

item.paragraph:
i. Get an EKG done on 6/23/2015.
ii. Get a Chest X-ray done on 6/23/2015 showing the Lower Respiratory Tract Structure.
iii. Take Clindamycin 300mg three times a day as needed if pain does not subside/
iv. Schedule follow on visit with Neighborhood Physicians Practice on 7/1/2015.
Electronically signed by Henry Seven at 12/01/2020 8:05 PM CST

item.caption: Davis, Albert, MD - 06/22/2015 11:59 PM CDT
item.paragraph: Ms Alice Newman seems to be developing high fever and hence we recommend her to get admitted to a nearby hospital using the provided referral.
Electronically signed by Albert Davis, MD at 12/01/2020 10:06 AM CST

td.paragraph:
i. Get an EKG done on 6/23/2015.
ii. Get a Chest X-ray done on 6/23/2015 showing the Lower Respiratory Tract Structure.
iii. Take Clindamycin 300mg three times a day as needed if pain does not subside/
iv. Schedule follow on visit with Neighborhood Physicians Practice on 7/1/2015.
Get rid of intermittent fever that is occurring every few weeks.
Need to gain more energy to do regular activities

item.caption: POCT PERFORM URINE DIPSTICK (POCT URINALYSIS DIPSTICK) - Edited Result - FINAL (06/22/2015)

td.paragraph: Ms Alice Newman was tested for the Urinanalysis macro panel and the results have been found to be normal.

item.caption: Assessment and Plan - Davis, Albert, MD - 06/22/2015 11:59 PM CDT
item.paragraph: The patient was found to have fever and Dr Davis is suspecting Anemia based on the patient history. So Dr Davis asked the patient to closely monitor the temperature and blood pressure and get admitted to Community Health Hospitals if the fever does not subside within a day.
Electronically signed by Albert Davis, MD at 11/30/2020 1:33 PM CST
